title: Broken link in docs
description:
The link for "Nightly Build Documentation" is broken on http://lucene.apache.org/core/developer.html

(btw, any update on the status of a 4.0 alpha/beta release?)

comments.content: thanks for pointing out the broken link .. no idea what that sub-section was suppose to be about since there is a "nightly javadocs" section right below it, so i just removed it
comments.author: Hoss Man
